LanguageData.HardcoreSKproject: Rimworld project by Hardcore SK team
LanguageData.TraitGoodMoodA: 由于长时间保持良好心情
LanguageData.TraitBadMoodA: 由于长时间处于不好情绪
LanguageData.TraitCannibal: 已经意识到在吃了人肉之后...其实味道不错！
LanguageData.PlaceWorker.MustWaterSeaOrPile: 必须放在浅水地形或者桩柱上。
LanguageData.ImpassableDoor: 必须要两边有支撑结构，并且通道上未被阻挡的情况下才能将门放置在此处。
LanguageData.OnMudOrWaterReportString: 无法收集物资，请选择合适的地形例如水边或者泥地等。
LanguageData.NeedGenBioHopper: 需要生物质反应堆料斗
LanguageData.NeedGenBioHopperDesc:
你的生物质反应堆没有填料装置。

生物质反应堆正常工作的时候需要料斗供应反应物质。

在生物质反应堆旁边修建一个料斗。
LanguageData.NeedFuelFeederDesc:
你的燃料发电站没有填料装置。

燃料发电站正常工作的时候需要料斗供应反应物质。

在燃料发电站旁边修建一个料斗。
LanguageData.NeedGenHopperDesc:
你的工业装置没有填料装置。

这个装置正常工作的时候需要料斗供应反应物质。

请在装置旁边修建一个料斗。
LanguageData.NeedPlasmaGenFeederDesc:
你的工业装置没有填料装置。

这个装置正常工作的时候需要料斗供应反应物质。

请在装置旁边修建一个料斗。
LanguageData.NeedNuclearFeederDesc:
你的工业装置没有填料装置。

这个装置正常工作的时候需要料斗供应反应物质。

请在装置旁边修建一个料斗。
LanguageData.NeedCentrifugeFeederDesc:
你的工业装置没有填料装置。

这个装置正常工作的时候需要料斗供应反应物质。

请在装置旁边修建一个料斗。
LanguageData.NeedElectronicFeederDesc:
你的工业装置没有填料装置。

这个装置正常工作的时候需要料斗供应反应物质。

请在装置旁边修建一个料斗。
LanguageData.NeedCoalFeederDesc:
你的工业装置没有填料装置。

这个装置正常工作的时候需要料斗供应反应物质。

请在装置旁边修建一个料斗。
LanguageData.AnotherGH: 离另一个地热加热器太近了。
LanguageData.AnotherPG: 离另一个等离子发电机太近了。
LanguageData.NoPlasmaGeothermalPlant: 附近没有等离子发生器。
LanguageData.AnotherME: 距离另一个采矿器太近。
LanguageData.AnotherPGR: 离另一个等离子体反应堆太近了。
LanguageData.AnotherFG: 离另一个钻井平台太近了。
LanguageData.AnotherGG: 离另一个地热发电机太近了。
LanguageData.NeedOilFeederDesc:
你的工业装置没有填料装置。

这个装置正常工作的时候需要料斗供应反应物质。

请在装置旁边修建一个料斗。
LanguageData.NeedHeaterHopperDesc:
你的工业装置没有填料装置。

这个装置正常工作的时候需要料斗供应反应物质。

请在装置旁边修建一个料斗。
LanguageData.NearWithAnotherFissure: 太靠近另一个裂缝或挖矿机。
LanguageData.NeedAntimatterReactorFeeder: 需要反物质反应堆料斗
LanguageData.NeedAntimatterReactorFeederDesc:
你的工业装置没有填料装置。

这个装置正常工作的时候需要料斗供应反应物质。

请在装置旁边修建一个料斗。
LanguageData.NeedHadronColliderFeederDesc:
你的工业装置没有填料装置。

这个装置正常工作的时候需要料斗供应反应物质。

请在装置旁边修建一个料斗。
LanguageData.OneTradingSpotMessage: 一个地图上只能有一个交易点。移除之前的交易点。
LanguageData.PowerSwitch_AutoONMotionRoom: 房间内有运动物体时自动开启。
LanguageData.PowerSwitch_AutoONMotionNearbyRange: 附近有运动物体时自动开启。范围：
LanguageData.PowerSwitch_AutoONEnemyNearbyRange: 附近有敌人时自动开启。范围：
LanguageData.PowerSwitch_AutoOFFEnemyNearbyRange: 附近有敌人时自动关闭。范围：
LanguageData.PowerSwitch_TimerClickSwitchOnTime: 定时器：点击设置开启时间
LanguageData.PowerSwitch_TimerClickSwitchOffTime: 定时器：点击设置关闭时间
LanguageData.TempGaugeAlertDesc: 某一个或多个温度计报告温度超过警戒值。
LanguageData.TempGaugeAlertHotDesc: 温度计附近的温度已经超过了 {0}。
LanguageData.TempGaugeAlertColdDesc: 温度计附近的温度已经降到了{0}以下。
LanguageData.AlertGizmoDesc: 当温度未在指定范围时，温度计是否发出警报。
LanguageData.PGLDesc: 使整个房间内的栽培盆都种植同一种作物。
LanguageData.CallShipDesc: 当亚空间高频发射器充能完毕时，你能用它来呼叫一艘太空商船。
LanguageData.InsufficientChargeLevel: 能量不足，无法联系到任何飞船。
LanguageData.MSScanRange: 当前/最大 扫描半径:
LanguageData.InsPowerAddRes: 没有足够的能量用于添加资源
LanguageData.InsPowerAddCol: 没有足够的能量用于增加殖民者
LanguageData.InsPTEC: 能量不足，无法建立连接。
LanguageData.IncHaulPriorityDesc: 为标记的物品增加搬运优先级。
LanguageData.OverHaulPriorityDesc: 覆写物品的搬运优先级。
LanguageData.FishIndustry.TooCloseFishingPier: 距离另一个捕鱼点太近。
LanguageData.FishIndustry.TooCloseFishingZone: 过于靠近另一个捕鱼区。
LanguageData.FishIndustry.FishingPier_MustTouchBank: 捕鱼码头必须靠近岸边。
LanguageData.FishIndustry.FishingPier_PierMustBeOnWat: 捕鱼码头必须置于水面。
LanguageData.FishIndustry.FishingPier_ZoneMustBeOnWat: 捕鱼区域必须位于水中。
LanguageData.FishIndustry.NeedHopperLabel: 需要生态养殖槽进料口
LanguageData.FishIndustry.NeedHopperExplanation:
你有一个未连接进料口生态养殖槽。

必须要有一个装填了生素食的生态养殖槽进料口供给原料，生态养殖槽才能正常工作。

在生态养殖槽旁建造一个生态养殖槽供进料口。
LanguageData.FishIndustry.IdleAquacultureBasinExplana:
你有一个空闲的生态养殖槽

你应该提供一些鱼卵以开始养殖。

使用清单标签进行操作并确保你有一位指派了狩猎工作的殖民者。
LanguageData.FishIndustry.KillBredSpecies: 生态养殖槽中养殖的鱼类死亡。你应该检查其状态。
LanguageData.FishIndustry.FisherBitten: 在捕鱼的时候被尾齿鱼咬伤。
LanguageData.FishIndustry.FishDescriptionMashgon: 短时间繁殖，肉类产量低。
LanguageData.FishIndustry.FishDescriptionBlueblade: 中等时间繁殖，肉类产量中等。
LanguageData.FishIndustry.FishDescriptionTailteeth: 长时间繁殖，肉类产量高。
LanguageData.FishIndustry.EnsureHaveHunterAndEggs: 确定你已经为殖民者指派了狩猎工作，并且有足够的鱼卵（一片肉）进行繁殖。
LanguageData.FishIndustry.BreedingRequestedButNoEggsM: 需要足够的卵进行繁殖工作，请确保你有足够的龙虾卵。
LanguageData.FishIndustry.BreedingRequestedButNoEggsB: 需要足够的卵进行繁殖工作，请确保你有足够的蓝刀鱼卵。
LanguageData.FishIndustry.BreedingRequestedButNoEggsT: 需要足够的卵进行繁殖工作，请确保你有足够的尾齿鱼卵。
LanguageData.FishIndustry.AllowFishingDesc: 允许你的殖民者在这个区域捕鱼。
LanguageData.FishIndustry.AllowUsingCornDesc: 允许殖民者使用玉米等物品来打窝，可以增加捕鱼速度。
LanguageData.DeadMarineDesc:
在钓鱼的时候居然发现了一具尸体。

对于这件事情真的令人非常烦恼，不过从这具尸体的衣服来看，他生前应该是某个矿业公司的安保人员。我也很好奇在他身上发生了什么事情...
LanguageData.FishIndustry.MicroFungus: 部分生态养殖槽感染了奇怪的水生真菌。\n似乎消耗了水中的所有氧气。\n希望鱼能熬过去吧。
LanguageData.FishIndustry.SunkenTreasure: {0}在钓鱼的时候发现了水下宝藏！意外之喜！\n
LanguageData.FishIndustry.DesignatorFishingZoneDesc: 设置一个用于捕鱼的区域。
LanguageData.FuelFilterMessage: 燃料配置为默认值（允许所有可用燃料）。如果想关闭这个建筑，可以将燃料装载配置于0%
LanguageData.InsectHuntMessage: 一只掠食性昆虫离开巢穴开始捕猎。
LanguageData.UniformGrowZoneDesc: 规划一个肥力相等的种植区。
LanguageData.accidentdesc: 发生了一起不幸的事故。
LanguageData.AutoFlickingDesc: 自动指定殖民者在昼夜切换的时候开闭开关。
LanguageData.EQMess: 地震来袭! 检查是否有人受伤? \n\n这次地震似乎损坏了很多建筑物。
LanguageData.EQMessLow: 地震来袭! 检查是否有人受伤? \n\n这次地震似乎损坏了一些建筑物。
LanguageData.DescEQ: 危险！ 地震！ 注意落石！
LanguageData.SAMess: 本地区地质活动频繁。 \n\n山区将会有大量落石，请注意安全！
LanguageData.LookDiscA: 我们找到了飞船残骸的位置，或许还有生还的宇航员。
LanguageData.WandererInitialSK: 来自{0}的NAME 旅行到附近时发现了这个殖民地并且非常看好这里. HECAP 希望加入你的伟大事业。
LanguageData.MDDesc: 我们探查出一个新的矿物分布点！
LanguageData.RMDDesc: 我们探查出一个新的稀有矿物分布点！
LanguageData.OFDesc: 我们探查出一个新的原油沉积点！
LanguageData.HeStash: 决定慷慨的捐献出一把珍藏已久的枪给殖民地。 \n\n他拿出了
LanguageData.SheStash: 决定慷慨的捐献出一把珍藏已久的枪给殖民地。 \n\n她拿出了
LanguageData.HeMoney: 决定拿出自己的一部分财物用于殖民地发展。\n\n他决定捐献
LanguageData.SheMoney: 决定拿出自己的一部分财物用于殖民地发展。\n\n她决定捐献
LanguageData.AmnesiaHeDesc: 突然记不起自己要干嘛了，他对要做的事情完全没有印象。
LanguageData.AmnesiaSheDesc: 突然记不起自己要干嘛了，她对要做的事情完全没有印象。
LanguageData.CalmWeatherDesc: 天气变得异常平静。风力发电机近乎无效，但是没有风力影响弹道，却是个打猎的好天气。
LanguageData.ThanksgivingDesc: 一个部落注意到你们快要挨饿，所以他们送给你一些食物帮你度过难关，而且没有任何附加条件。\n\n他们如此善良，并希望你们的友谊地久天长。
LanguageData.DescBug: 本地突然出现大量变异蝗虫！你最好快点清除它们，不然地上的所有东西很快就会被它们吃光！
LanguageData.WarnFalling: 警报： 一艘未知的宇宙飞船正在坠落！
LanguageData.DescMT: 逃生舱里的人看起来惊恐害怕得难以置信。他们应该是经历了什么可怕的事情吧！
LanguageData.TheThingDesc: 转变成了一个巨大的憎恶怪兽! 谁也不清楚是什么导致了突变。 \n\n赶快消灭这个怪物，不然你的殖民者们都会被它撕成碎片。
LanguageData.LetterZeonPasses: 许多人都将自己的小命交代在了这个机械族BOSS——Zeon的手中。也许你应该考虑放弃你的殖民地了。
LanguageData.EndGame: 附近一艘来自另一个星系团的飞船收到了失事地点的简略情报，这是根据你在飞船被摧毁时发出的遇险信号得到的。他们决定来救援你的殖民者们。你可以选择现在就让救援船队来解救你们并结束游戏，或者选择留下来探索这个边缘世界，决定权在你手里。
LanguageData.HungryAnimal: 有一只野兽开始发疯般的攻击你的殖民者和家畜！
LanguageData.LetterFeenixPasses:
一只芬尼克斯正路过这个地区。

这种传奇生物就是火焰的化身。没错，它就是一个活的火源，芬尼克斯的心在黑市上是属于有价无市的东西。 

这是一种伴随着火焰的生物，如果激怒了它，你会看到整个殖民地都被火焰吞噬。

们可以被驯服，但是只有最勇敢的人才能完成这项艰巨的任务，当然，还要提一句，这个人还要不怕火！
LanguageData.LetterIcicatPasses:
一只冰麟路过这个地区。

这是一种孤寂而平和的传奇生物，它也被称为“冰霜化身”。没错，它就是一个活的冰雪之源，冰麟的心在黑市上是属于有价无市的东西。 

虽然性情温顺，但是一头愤怒的冰麟一定会让你终身难忘。

它们可以被驯服，但是只有最勇敢的人才能完成这项艰巨的任务，当然，还要提一句，这个人还要不怕冷！
LanguageData.RaptorArrived: 一群翼猛龙正在本区域猎食！最好离它们远点！哈，是的！远远的，你不知道它们什么时候会出现在你面前，当你看见它们的时候，剩下的念头就只有一个——跑吧！或许还有一个，尖叫！！！
LanguageData.DevourersCropsText: 你的殖民地里不知道从哪里冒出一堆奇怪的害虫，它们好像什么东西都吃，你最好尽快把有用的东西搬离害虫活动区域。
LanguageData.HungryFlockText: 一群不知道受了什么刺激的小动物出现在这个地区，它们疯了一般冲向你的殖民者们。你可以想办法把它们变成你的存粮，或者找个安全的地方躲避，过两天它们就会离开。
LanguageData.DescMalariaRaid: 本地的大量蚊子导致疟疾横行，你最好小心那些蚊子！
LanguageData.DescFleaRaid: 本地的大量跳蚤导致瘟疫迅速传播，你最好处理下不停增长的跳蚤！
LanguageData.SwarmArrived: 一大群具有极强攻击性的虫子突然出现在这个地区。 \n别想其他的了，赶快回到基地，剩下的就只有等虫子们自己散去了！
LanguageData.PestsDesc: 你的殖民地田地里不知道从哪里冒出一堆作物害虫，你最好在它们把你的农作物啃光前处理掉它们。
LanguageData.DescAG: 随着一股神秘气息的飘过，这个区域的动物开始不断死亡。 \n但是，你却发现，所有的人类生物却毫发无伤，真是奇怪！
LanguageData.DescAE: 一座发电装置的核心引擎因为故障发生爆炸。装置受到严重损害。
LanguageData.DescBH: 一颗陨石坠落到附近，引起一场巨大的爆炸。
LanguageData.DescFEtwo: 们在野外聚集，并且准备进攻殖民地，你最好赶紧启动防御计划！
LanguageData.DescEM:
本次日蚀的成因不是月亮，而是一颗过境的巨大陨星造成的！
一定要当心这个陨星上掉下来的那些碎片！ 

当然，这些碎片里面也许会含有很多贵重元素。
LanguageData.DescHC: 一群饥饿的肉食动物出现在本地区，它们四处寻找食物！对，别看了，你的殖民者们就很像是合适的食物！！！
LanguageData.NEDesc: 警告!!! 核反应堆发生爆炸！
LanguageData.DescRVH: 一种奇怪的病毒在殖民地爆发开来！本地区的绝大部分人类因为病毒的影响变得疯狂，并且不停的攻击彼此！你的一半殖民者也受到这一影响，你最好赶紧做好补救措施！
LanguageData.TribMigrDesc: 一队部落旅行者正途经你的殖民地区域。\n\n他们是如此的风尘仆仆，以至于根本无法想象在走向目的地的过程中，他们忍受了多少灾难痛苦，又迎来了多少希望！
LanguageData.MeteorStopDesc: 流星雨已经停止。未侦测到更多的流星！
LanguageData.DescBMH: 一场流星雨正袭向整个星球，巨大的爆炸伴随着火焰笼罩着整个殖民地！
LanguageData.RazorOverDesc: 看起来已经没有新的的轨道垃圾坠落下来。
LanguageData.DescRZ: 某些环绕星球的垃圾碎片因为重力原因开始不停的坠落下来，小心头顶！
LanguageData.CosmicRadiationLevel: 看起来辐射强度已经恢复到正常水平了。
LanguageData.DescCR: 熬过了强辐射，正努力帮助其他殖民者
LanguageData.DescHCR: 来自太阳的过量耀斑辐射已经开始影响本区域的人类生物了。 \n\n每个人都感到焦虑、紧张，而且，这种情况在老年人身上更加明显。
LanguageData.DescNF: 我的天！辐射尘四处弥漫！生物都在慢慢死亡！要整整100天我们才能熬过铀元素的半衰期！
LanguageData.PlunderersArrived: Some scouts from perhaps a nearby insectoid hive are poking around your territory. They will no doubt act as menace to both your colonists and ecosystem while they look about. Careful, it looks as though they'll engage any colonists that get too close!
LanguageData.MoonFallMessageMeteorSwarm: A swarm of meteors -- possibly smaller pieces of your ship -- crosses the sky, burning up in the atmosphere。
LanguageData.MoonFallMessageMeteorSwarmTribal: A swarm of meteors flame across the sky, but none crash to the ground near you。
LanguageData.SkyFallMeteorite: A lump of {0} just crashed to the ground. It was presumably once part of your ship, but the forces that ripped the ship apart, followed by the heat of uncontrolled reentry, have left nothing but a misshapen mass。
LanguageData.MoonFallMeteoriteTribal: A large meteorite has struck ground in the area. It has left behind a lump of {0}。
LanguageData.MoonFallFlashstorm: Ionization in the atmosphere from the recent cascade of ship chunks and meteorites has caused a localized flashstorm. This can cause massive fires。
LanguageData.MoonFallFlashstormTribal: The gods are angry again, but instead of hurling rocks, they now hurl lightning. A flashstorm has begun. Beware of fires。
LanguageData.SkyFallRefugeePodCrash: You've detected an escape pod crashing hard nearby.\n\nThe occupant is an old acquaintance from your ship, who's agreed to join you。
LanguageData.DescTrySuicide: tried to commit suicide, but it did not work out。
LanguageData.DescSuicide_A: One of your prisoners died in the cell and has left a final message behind. It reads: "Cameras everywhere. Watching. Always watching. The walls all around are moving, watching. Can't sleep, always watching. You see me and I don't see you! No lights here, no no. Watch you in the dark they do. Cameras, eyes of spies! You'll watch me no more!"
LanguageData.DescSuicide_B: Your prisoner smashed it's head against the wall and has died. A small piece of paper nearby has a message that was hastily scrawled. It reads: "I thought there would be easy cash in this Colony...but instead I got trapped into something horrible. I think I'm going crazy. This food...the Warden said it was "yummy, tasty, mmm" but I don't believe it. Something tastes wrong about it. My old injuries still haunt me, like a nightmare that never ends. Even the barely audible sound of the door causes me to shudder as if it were thunder"。
LanguageData.DescSuicide_C: A prisoner has committed suicide shortly after asking a Colonist: "Where are my meals? I need nourishment! Muffalo meat or something! GIVE ME FOOD!"
LanguageData.DescSuicide_D: A prisoner who was found dead had kept a diary with multiple entries. It reads: "A rough cough. I feel cold and hot. I caught something, a flu maybe? No ventilation in here. Cough getting worse. My mouth is dry, it tastes like rust*blood splatter covers some words*rible. I see people sometimes, they promised me a future. To think I even liked it! I was promised food, a good bed and could one day use my skills again. I believed that, but not anymore. I need*blood splatter covers more words* worth a try。
LanguageData.DescSuicide_E: A prisoner was found deceased under the bed. A small note was crumpled up nearby. It angrily reads: "They wanted to operate on me! They were going to harvest me for organs! These people are crazies! YOU WON'T HARVEST ME ALIVE! I WON'T LET YOU!
LanguageData.DescSuicide_F: A prisoner has succumbed. A quick look at the body shows signs of infection and gangrene in hidden areas. The pain must have be extruciating。
LanguageData.DescSuicide_G: A prisoner has perished. Scrawled into the floor is a note. It reads: "Suddenly no one comes? Am I going to die here like an abandoned dog in a cage?"。
LanguageData.DescSuicide_H: One of your prisoners suddenly couldn't stand up. The doctor's first thought was that the prisoner's psyche was tender, overwhelmed by the anxiety and depression from imprisonment. Then the prisoner suddenly died! Upon the autopsy examination, a long fat stick was found up the prisoner's rear and had gouged the intestines. What an unfortunate circumstance。
LanguageData.DescSuicide_I: A prisoner has died under mysterious circumstances. The body was found in the fetal position with its hands covering its eyes. The prisoner seems to have choked when it swallowed its own tongue。
LanguageData.DescSuicide_J: A prisoner has died under mysterious circumstances. A quick inspection of the body tells the tale. The prisoner seems to have tried hanging itself with a boot lace, but the lace broke. The prisoner then tried to gnaw off the door handle, as indicated by the bloody bite marks on the door. Failing that the prisoner swallowed part of the boot, where it got lodged in the throat and the prisoner suffocated。
LanguageData.DescSuicide_K: The prisoner died under mysterious circumstances. A medical summary paper was found nearby. It reads: "Patient has distemper, intestinal ticks and show signs of being in a delirious state. Patient has tried to eat it's own feet and hands. I recommend isolating the patient and attempting experimental procedures. It might have lupus."
LanguageData.DescSuicide_L: A prisoner has been found dead under the bed, and a scrap of paper was found nearby. It looks like a mission report and it reads: "Here is your job. Land at the listed co-ordinates and grab some weapons, ammunition, rations and armor. Then follow us and assault the illegal colony. They shouldn't be here and we're going to enforce that. You may be a rookie but this will be easy. They won't know what hit 'em!"。
LanguageData.DescSuicide_M: A prisoner has died. A message was found in a notebook. It reads: "We were waiting for orders when suddenly some air defense shot down our ship! I survived by jumping in the escape pod. When the pod opened I was immediately under fire. I was caught and imprisoned. I don't know what happened to the others. I don't think I'll be leaving this place alive. If you're still monitoring me, let them know what happened and tell them to stay away from this place"。
LanguageData.DescSuicide_N: A prisoner has suddenly died. A strange message was found scrawed on a medical paper. It reads "They wanted to do a test procedure on me with experimental bionics and regenerative tissue. They wanted to cut off my leg. So, I passed. I'll show them that I don't need medical help! My flesh and blood is my own, a little infection won't stop me! I AM INVINCIBLE!"
LanguageData.DamagedTent: Damaged tent deployed. Some walls will be missing。

LanguageData.JammedBudgedClosed: The Jammed Blast Door budged and is now closed。
LanguageData.JammedBudgedWontClose: The Jammed Blast Door budged but it won't close。

LanguageData.VeinMinerDesc: Click on a visible ore and you will mine the whole vein。

LanguageData.CaveworldFlora.TooClose: An other fungiponics basin is too close。
LanguageData.Tend_notEnoughSkill: Requires a colonist with a medical skill of 8 or higher to tend prisoner。
LanguageData.CaveworldFlora.BlackLotus: One of your colonists has been intoxicated by the effluvium of a black lotus. Beware, those emanations are extremely toxic。
LanguageData.studyreport:
### Study report ###

Study subject: strange mechanoid artifact

- Artifact location:
LanguageData.observation:
- Observations:
 1. the artifact has deployed underground foundations.
 2. some pylons have been erected near the main structure.
 3. the artifact seems to generate powerful artificial thunderstorms.

- Deductions:
 1. this device appears to be a mechanoid terraformer.
 2. its purpose is to re-shape the surface of this planet to prepare a large-scale invasion.

- Recommandations:
 1. proceed with *extreme* caution when attempting anything on the artifact!
 2. deactivating the onboard beacon should be a priority to avoid future invasion.
 3. consider re-routing the power generated during artificial thunderstorms.
 4. further research may allow us to take advantage of those artificial thunderstorms.
LanguageData.noskill: is not skilled enough to extract the terraformer weather controller (research level
LanguageData.noskill_net: is not skilled enough to reroute the terraformer power network (research level
LanguageData.noskilk_ext: is not skilled enough to extract the terraformer weather controller (research level
LanguageData.noskill_rer: is not skilled enough to reroute the terraformer power network (research level
LanguageData.noskill_study: is not skilled enough to study the strange artifact (research level
LanguageData.attack: Attacking the artifact seems to be a bad idea. You have detected some sort of emergency call sent from it.\nWhatever it is, this does not sound good at all..。
LanguageData.Before_extraction: Before its extraction, the mechanoid terraformer AI core controller somehow detected your attempts at shutting it down.\nIt had enough time to emit an emergency call. Be prepared to welcome the incoming terrafomer defending force。
LanguageData.success_extract: You have successfully extracted the weather controller from the mechanoid terraformer.\n\nYou can now build your own one to unleash the sky's wrath on your ennemies。
LanguageData.success_reroute: You have successfully rerouted the power network of the mechanoid terraformer.\n\nRemember that you need some batteries to stock the brief surges of energy generated by the thunderstorms。
LanguageData.invaders: Beware! The mechanoid invasion has begun. This world will soon become a new mechanoid hive!
LanguageData.strange_thing: You have detected a strange thing falling from the sky. It is quite bigger than a drop pod and does not emit the standard trading federation emergency call.\nYou should send someone to scout it but be careful, this stinks mechanoid technology..。
LanguageData.some_knowledge: has some knowledge about alien technology but
LanguageData.terr_beacon: still failed at properly disabling the terraformer beacon.\n\nBe prepared to welcome the incoming terrafomer defending force。
LanguageData.success_disabling: successfully disabled the terraformer beacon!\n\nYou have nothing to fear from it anymore。
LanguageData.alien_about: is not the best about alien technology,
LanguageData.real_crack: is a real crack in alien technology. Disabling the terraformer beacon was just another game for
LanguageData.no_fear: \n\nYou have nothing to fear from it anymore。
LanguageData.try_to_disable: has tried to disable the terraformer beacon but technology is not
LanguageData.button_press: just pressed on every button alerting by the way every nearby mechanoid shuttles.\n\nBe prepared to welcome some nasty and numerous visitors from nearby mechanoid hives!
LanguageData.hear: hears the loud noise of incoming drop pods.\n\nYou should better take
LanguageData.strange_building: is just arriving near the strange building when
LanguageData.secure_artifact:
You have secured the strange building.

You are now sure of one thing: this is a mechanoid device.
As usual when dealing with mechanoid technology, be really careful. You should better be prepared for anything...
LanguageData.repstudy:
report is quite alarming!
